net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm
Class InitListener

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.InitListener

public abstract class InitListener
extends java.lang.Object

When the init method on a monitor is called, an instance of this class can be passed to it. This listener will receive init event messages as the init runs. This is really just usefull for the splash screen.

Method Detail

getPrefix

public java.lang.String getPrefix()

update

public abstract void update(java.lang.String message,
                            int step,
                            int max)
Inform the listener of an update in the init status. Think of the parameters as this, the message is displayed to the user, and the step is #n of max.

Parameters:
message - IN - a displayable string message.
step - IN - the step index between 0 and max
max - IN - the maximum number of steps that will ever be send to the update string.
